summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2351, for the improvement of 18th Avenue South and 19th Avenue South, each from Hanford Street to Atlantic Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways and necessary cross walks, and providing for the necessary temporary wood walks and surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24363 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
